es.um.redes.P2P.PeerTracker.Client

Interface ReporterIface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Reporter

    public interface ReporterIface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message conversationWithTracker(Message request)
      Sends a request message to the tracker and receives the corresponding response(s), reassembling all datagrams into a single message if the response consists of several fragments.
      Message receiveMessageFromTracker(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
      Receives a response message from the tracker.

      Sends a request message to the tracker.

    • Method Detail

      • conversationWithTracker

        Message conversationWithTracker(Message request)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a request message to the tracker and receives the corresponding response(s), reassembling all datagrams into a single message if the response consists of several fragments. This method must handle datagram loss using timeout and request retransmission.
        Parameters:
        request - The request message to be sent to the tracker.
        Returns:
        The response message to the request received from the tracker.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • receiveMessageFromTracker

        Message receiveMessageFromTracker(java.net.DatagramSocket socket)
        Receives a response message from the tracker.
        Parameters:
        socket - The datagram socket used for communication with the tracker,
        Returns:
        The response message received from the tracker, or null if it was not possible to receive any message (for whatever reason)

      • sendMessageToTracker

        boolean sendMessageToTracker(java.net.DatagramSocket socket,
                             Message request,
                             java.net.InetSocketAddress trackerAddress)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Sends a request message to the tracker.
        Parameters:
        socket - The datagram socket used for communication with the tracker
        request - The request message to be sent to the tracker
        trackerAddress - The destination socket address where the tracker listens for requests
        Returns:
        True if the request is sent successfully
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
